AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mechanical colonist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME is a sentient machine that is capable of displaying higher intelligence, newly birthed from their construction pod. What they make of their life is now up to them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Transcendant android
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME is an highly advanced android, they come from a civilisation where the human population had transcended into mechanical or quantum forms of pure perfection.
